quote: I really appreciate the privacy focus—no tracking and no ads. It’s the perfect productivity hub for Chrome!
name: Pranit Pathak

quote: Very minimalist and also less distracting and soothing at the same time...Great in built tools to solve daily tasks...Extension se pyaar hogya hai
name: Sahil Singh

quote: I like that Manix is clean and minimal. Unlike other new-tab extensions that feel overloaded, this one gives me exactly what I need without distracting clutter. It keeps me focused while still looking elegant
name: Anish

quote: ManiX is a game-changer! Clean design, handy tools, and everything I need right on my new tab—without slowing down my browser. It’s boosted my productivity and made browsing so much smoother!
name: Riya Kumari
